names.english: pill of coptis, rhubarb, phellodendron and mushroom
names.commonEnglish: Pill of Coptis, Scutellaria, Rhubarb and Mushroom

actions: Clears Heat, drains Dampness, drains Fire and resolves Fire toxicity.
Drains Heat, purges accumulations, drains Fire, invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat and reduces Fire toxicity.
With Huang Lian, for a feeling of fullness and distention due to Heat accumulation.
Drains Damp-Heat, drains Fire and relieves Fire toxicity.
Strengthens the Spleen, tonifies Qi, Calms the Liver and stimulates the appetite

contraindications: Do not take with chicken, fish, beef and mutton.

notes: If the pills are unable to be swallowed, take as a decoction.
